subject: Fw: Thank you for your recent loan request, we are ready to lend you money regardless of Credit
body:
Your credit history does not matter to us!
If your family OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE ready money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you THIS EVENING (hurry, this tender will expire TODAY):
$473,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest current payments!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill out this short form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://typinfanny.com/
